scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha app/**/*.test.js --require react-native-mock/mock.js --require ignore-styles --compilers js:babel-core/register app/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:watch: mocha app/**/*.test.js --require react-native-mock/mock.js --require ignore-styles --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter min --watch
scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && npm cache clean
